Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Stellar Mercury 002 Standard –Black, Singlecut Archtop Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · Pre-owned: The clearcoat on this guitar is aged around the binding which is a worn look but is definitely something a lot of people desire as a look. It’s a classic and plays like one regardless! · That’s one classy looking guitar! This guitar comes made out of a mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany bolt on neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. The entire guitar is painted a wonderful looking mirror black that combined with the multiply binding around the body makes the guitar look very sleek! The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar OSR humbucker pickups. These gold plated pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Specs Body: Mahogany body, multiply binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, multiply binding, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, cream binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, multiply binding Electronics: x2 Stellar OSR humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, Gold hardware
Title: Stellar Mercury 002 Standard –Black Beauty, Singlecut Archtop Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: The clearcoat on this guitar is aged around the binding which is a worn look but is definitely something a lot of people desire as a look.  It’s a classic and plays like one regardless!
